requirements.summary: Replace the multi-line Design Principles list on AuthGate with a single sentence.
acceptanceCriteria: AuthGate no longer renders the six individual principle lines.
AuthGate renders exactly the sentence “You restate what you’re already telling yourself.” as the sole design-principle text.
No other user-facing text changes occur as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the Design Principles block to remove the six individual lines (Minimal, Neutral, Language-first, Slightly uncomfortable, Clarity over comfort, Silence is intentional.) and render exactly one user-facing line: “You restate what you’re already telling yourself.” Ensure no other user-facing copy changes.
